name: Code Tenderloin
description: Code Tenderloin is a volunteer-run organization that removes barriers that keep people from securing long term employment, such as: finances, legal, soft skills, childcare, transportation, and education. Through partnership with other organizations, they provide social, financial, legal, and emotional support.
